Applicant : Buttcane, Carmen
School (district) : Richfield School District 316 (Richfield School)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : I frequently volunteer at the local Senior Citizen Center, I help cook food and decorate the building according to the seasons.  I also help with the annual Easter egg hunt. Preparing eggs and hiding them.  I also garden, and take time training my two dogs.

INTERESTS

	* It has been a long time since I have officially been working in an area other than the classroom.  And I would like to be a help to a business that is willing to take me on.

Secondary Teaching : No
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I frequently volunteer at the local Senior Citizen Center, I help cook food and decorate the building according to the seasons.  I also help with the annual Easter egg hunt. Preparing eggs and hiding them.  I also garden, and take time training my two dogs.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* It has been a long time since I have officially been working in an area other than the classroom.  And I would like to be a help to a business that is willing to take me on.  
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources

I frequently volunteer at the local Senior Citizen Center, I help cook food and decorate the building according to the seasons.  I also help with the annual Easter egg hunt. Preparing eggs and hiding them.  I also garden, and take time training my two dogs.

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* It has been a long time since I have officially been working in an area other than the classroom.  And I would like to be a help to a business that is willing to take me on.  
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources

	* Primary Email : buttcanec@yahoo.com
	* Secondary Email : carmbutt@richfieldsd.org
	* Phone : 2089616118
	* Communication & Availability : Fridays from  12 p.m. to 4 p.m.
Applicant : Buttcane, Carmen
School (district) : Richfield School District 316 (Richfield School)
Role(s) : Middle School Teacher;High School Teacher;
LinkedIn Profile : www.linkedin.com/in/carmen-buttcanerichfield

INTERESTS
Why they want to be a part of this program:
	* It has been a long time since I have officially been working in an area other than the classroom.  And I would like to be a help to a business that is willing to take me on.  
STEM fields they are particularly interested in learning more about:
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)
	* Trades & Industry (e.g. manufacturing, automotive, construction, etc.)
	* Health Professions (e.g. medical, nursing, pharmacy, veterinary, etc.)
	* Agriculture, Food, Natural Resources

EXPERIENCE
Grade Levels: 
	* 7
	* 8
	* 9
	* 10
	* 11
	* 12



STEM Domain Experience
	* Computer Science (e.g., coding, programming languages, software/app development, etc.) 
	* Information & Communication Technology (e.g. networking, data management, building/troubleshooting computer systems, etc.)

Business software & skills:
	* Spreadsheet Software (MS Excel or Google Sheets)	* Presentation Software (MS Powerpoint or Google Slides)	* Public Speaking / Group Presentation	* 
Instructional work they are open to during externship:
Elementary teaching : No
Secondary Teaching : No
Adult Teaching : No
Camp counselor : No
Curriculum design : No
Externship durations they are available for:
Other interesting experience:
I frequently volunteer at the local Senior Citizen Center, I help cook food and decorate the building according to the seasons.  I also help with the annual Easter egg hunt. Preparing eggs and hiding them.  I also garden, and take time training my two dogs.
